00039 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h>
00040 
00041 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00042 #include "Trace.h"
00043 
00044 #include <iostream>
00045 
00046 InstanceNode::InstanceNode( SoNode* node )
00047 : m_coinNode( node ), m_parent( 0 ) 
00048 {
00049         Trace trace( "InstanceNode::InstanceNode" );
00050 }
00051 
00052 InstanceNode::InstanceNode( const InstanceNode* node )
00053 {
00054         
00055 
00056         Trace trace( "InstanceNode::InstanceNode" );
00057         m_coinNode = node->m_coinNode;
00058         node->m_coinNode->ref();
00059         m_parent = node->m_parent;
00060         
00061         
00062         for( int index = 0; index < node->children.count(); index++ ) 
00063     {
00064         InstanceNode* child = new InstanceNode(*(node->children[index]));
00065         
00066         children.append(child);
00067     }
00068 
00069         
00070 }
00071 
00072 InstanceNode::~InstanceNode()
00073 {
00074         Trace trace( "InstanceNode::~InstanceNode" );
00075         qDeleteAll( children );
00076 }
00077 
00078 void InstanceNode::SetParent( InstanceNode* parent )
00079 {
00080         m_parent = parent;
00081 }
00082 
00083 void InstanceNode::SetNode( SoNode* node )
00084 {
00085         m_coinNode = node;
00086 }
00087 
00088 SoNode* InstanceNode::GetNode() const
00089 {
00090         Trace trace( "InstanceNode::GetNode" );
00091         return m_coinNode;
00092 }
00093 
00094 InstanceNode* InstanceNode::GetParent() const
00095 {
00096         Trace trace( "InstanceNode::GetParent" );
00097         return m_parent;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void InstanceNode::Print( int level ) const
00101 {
00102         Trace trace( "InstanceNode::Print" );
00103         for( int i = 0; i < level; i++ ) std::cout << " ";
00104     std::cout << m_coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString() << " has " << children.size() << " children "<<std::endl;
00105     for( int index = 0; index < children.count(); index++ ) 
00106     {
00107         children[index]->Print( level++ );
00108     }
00109 }
00110 
00111 void InstanceNode::AddChild( InstanceNode* child )
00112 {
00113     children.append( child );
00114     child->SetParent( this );
00115 }
00116 
00117 void InstanceNode::InsertChild( int row, InstanceNode* instanceChild)
00118 {
00119         if( row > children.size() ) row = children.size();
00120         children.insert( row, instanceChild);
00121         instanceChild->SetParent(this);
00122 }
00123 
00124 QDataStream & operator<< ( QDataStream & s, const InstanceNode & node )
00125 {
00126         s << node.m_coinNode;
00127         return s;
00128 }
00129 
00130 QDataStream & operator>> ( QDataStream & s, const InstanceNode & node )
00131 {
00132         s >> node;
00133         return s;
00134 }
00135 
00136 bool operator==(const InstanceNode& thisNode,const InstanceNode& otherNode)
00137 {
00138         return ( (thisNode.GetNode() == otherNode.GetNode()) && 
00139                         (thisNode.GetParent()->GetNode()==otherNode.GetParent()->GetNode()));
00140 }
